benchmark_details.name: BanMANI
benchmark_details.overview: BanMANI is a dataset of social media content labeled with information manipulation relative to reference articles in the Bengali language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To identify whether a news-related social media item is manipulated.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Due to budget constraints, a limited set of human-written social media items were collected.

data.source: Social media posts collected from Facebook and news articles from the BanFakeNews dataset.
data.annotation: Annotated by human annotators following a semi-automatic method.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on classification and span extraction tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better classification performance.
methodology.baseline_results: Zero-shot ChatGPT F1 score of 57.02%, fine-tuned model F1 score of 65.77%.
methodology.validation: Inter-annotator agreement of 92.2% per Cohen's kappa.
